Outcome Measures: SUVR (Standard Uptake Value Ratio)|CDR-SB score (Clinical Dementia Rating Sum of Boxes)|ADAS-Cog-11 score (Alzheimer's Disease assessment Scale-Cognitive Subscale (11 items))|MMSE (Mini-mental status examination)|ADCS-ADL-MCI (Alzheimer's Disease Cooperative Study-Activities of Daily Living Inventory)|C-SSRS (Columbia Suicide Severity Rating Scale)|NPI (Neuropsychiatric Inventory)|Treatment related Adverse Events
Study Designs: Allocation: Randomized|Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment|Masking: Double (Participant, Investigator)|Primary Purpose: Treatment
